de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes

类 Fill

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes.AbstractAttribute
      • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes.Fill

  • public class Fill
extends AbstractAttribute

    The fill attribute class can define a color, a gradient color, a gradient rotation, and a filling image. It is used by annotations, pages, transitions and pages.

    作者:
    Adrian Lange

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  Fill.GradientRotation
      Enumeration to set the rotation of the gradient

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_COLOR
      Default color as CSS2 color string
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_GRADIENT_COLOR
      Default gradient color as CSS2 color string
      static Fill.GradientRotation DEFAULT_GRADIENT_ROTATION
      Default gradient rotation
      static java.net.URI DEFAULT_IMAGE
      Default image

      Creates new fill attribute with default values.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getColor()
      Returns the fill color as CSS2 color string or null if no fill color has been specified.
      java.lang.String getGradientColor()
      Returns the gradient color as CSS2 color string or null if no gradient color has been specified.
      Fill.GradientRotation getGradientRotation()
      Returns the gradient rotation or null if no gradient rotation has been specified.
      java.net.URI getImage()
      Returns the image as URI or null if no image has been specified.
      boolean hasContent()
      Returns true if at least one of the attribute's values is not null.
      void setColor(java.lang.String color)
      Sets the color of the fill attribute as CSS2 color string.
      void setGradientColor(java.lang.String gradientColor)
      Sets the gradient color for the fill attribute as CSS2 color string.
      void setGradientRotation(Fill.GradientRotation gradientRotation)
      Sets the gradient rotation for the fill attribute.
      void setImage(java.net.URI image)
      Sets the image for the fill attribute.
      java.lang.String toString()

      • DEFAULT_COLOR

        Default color as CSS2 color string
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • DEFAULT_GRADIENT_COLOR

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_GRADIENT_COLOR
        Default gradient color as CSS2 color string

        Default gradient rotation

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Fill

        public Fill()
        Creates new fill attribute with default values.

      • Fill

        public Fill(java.lang.String color,
            java.lang.String gradientColor,
            Fill.GradientRotation gradientRotation,
            java.net.URI image)
        Creates a new fill attribute with the specified values.
        参数:
        color - CSS2 color string for the filling color or null if it should be ignored.
        gradientColor - CSS2 color string for the gradient color or null if it should be ignored.
        gradientRotation - Rotation of the gradient or null if it should be ignored.
        image - Filling image URI or null if it should be ignored.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getColor

        public java.lang.String getColor()
        Returns the fill color as CSS2 color string or null if no fill color has been specified.
        返回:
        the color

        Returns the gradient rotation or null if no gradient rotation has been specified.
        返回:

      • getImage

        public java.net.URI getImage()
        Returns the image as URI or null if no image has been specified.
        返回:
        the image

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.lang.String color)
        Sets the color of the fill attribute as CSS2 color string. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        color - the color to set

      • setGradientColor

        public void setGradientColor(java.lang.String gradientColor)
        Sets the gradient color for the fill attribute as CSS2 color string. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        gradientColor - the gradientColor to set

      • setGradientRotation

        public void setGradientRotation(Fill.GradientRotation gradientRotation)
        Sets the gradient rotation for the fill attribute. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        gradientRotation - the gradientRotation to set

      • setImage

        public void setImage(java.net.URI image)
        Sets the image for the fill attribute. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        image - the image to set
